name: To Roll Dice
description:
To Roll Dice is a simple puzzle game about moving dice on a grid. The goal is to move the dice onto the numbered tile with the correct number facing upwards. 

To Roll Dice was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022 where the theme was "Roll of the Dice".

Credits:
Leo Alkberg - Programming
Dennis Löfgren - Game Design, Level Design, Art, UI/UX
Leo Raitaniemi - Programming, UI
Carl Stengård - Game Design, Level Design, Sound Design

Controls (Controller):
D-Pad - Move
Y - Retry
Menu - Exit

Controls (Keyboard):
W, A, S, D - Move
R - Retry
Escape - Exit
